title: Questions about a little buddy Kog'Maw.
body: So the anatomy of Kog'Maw has been on my mind for a while now but I have not found an answers for the questions, how many Stomachs does Kog'Maw have? How does his little body work? What makes our little guy, our little guy? These are the questions that are on my mind any help to solve these questions would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: I think one of his parents was an Alienâ„¢ and the other was like a chicken or something.
he has 19 each of wich is about halve his size and 8 times his weigt
